p: For comparison, we repeated the MWAS using KW as statistical test (Table 2 and Supplementary Tables 4– 5). For KW, genera counts were transformed to genera relative abundances. Unclassified genera, and genera present in <10% of samples were excluded from KW MWAS. KW does not allow covariate adjustment. The kruskal.test function from the stats R package was used to test for significance. P-values were two-sided and corrected for multiple testing using Benjamini–Hochberg FDR method implemented in the p.adjust function from stats package.
